ygData.subject: Re: Glyphin's Comments
ygData.msgSnippet: I found your comments very interesting Glyphin.  I look forward to testing them out.  It ll be many levels yet before I have the chance as I m only level
ygData.messageBody:
I found your comments very interesting Glyphin. I look forward to testing them
out. It'll be many levels yet before I have the chance as I'm only level 14...heh
you level slower when you have 2 primary characters <G>...but it's nice to hear
some positive comments.

For those who are so frustrated with the wizard class, take a break for a bit.
Go play another class up to level 10..something that has intrigued you maybe.
I have 6 of my char slots with chars in them because when I get frustrated I go
play another char. We all get frustrated at times but sending yet another
petition isn't the answer.

Iggie
Level 14 Gnome Wizard
Cazic Thule
